summary: Horse call with a horn will work in Bruma
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14950/?][b]Convenient Horses[/b][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/84946/?]Beyond Skyrim - Bruma[/url]
[b]Patch

[img width=575,height=329]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/85549-2-1500917643.png[/img]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/11024/?]Convenient Horses Bruma Patch for SSE[/url][/b][/center][/size]

I'm not a script expert but after I've looked at the esp there was only one entry that could be changed.
and it works


[size=3][u][b]What the fix do: [/b][/u][/size]
Horse call with a horn will work in Bruma. So followers can call their own horses.

[size=3][u][b]Changes made:[/b][/u][/size]
Add:
FromID List
0302AB02 CHRidableWorldList
BSHeartland "Tamriel" [WRLD:020A764B]

And the Masterfile entries

[u][b][size=3]Install:[/size]
[/b][/u]Use NMM to download and place the Patch.esp under Convenient Horses.esp


Have fun while riding in Bruma.

Information:
When the official patch from Alek appears this Mod will be removed.
